entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening and after midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023
